definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: A blindly ending branch of the alimentary canal or other organ.
sentences.chinese: 消化道或其他器官分支的盲端。

sentences.english: We could go get a bowl of fish balls and wash it down with a sour plum drink.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以去喝一碗魚丸湯，然後用酸梅汁將它消化掉。

sentences.english: The developer is under the family, is responsible for land which digests encircles .
sentences.chinese: 開發商是“下家”，負責消化圈來的土地。

sentences.english: The doctors tell me that's what has knocked my digestion out being so infernally jealous of her.
sentences.chinese: 醫生們說我消化不良就是因爲我對她嫉妒得太厲害啦。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical characteristic of alimentary tract hemorrhage caused by ancylostomiasis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鉤蟲感染導致消化道出血的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Drinking potato juice every day can ease indigestion, a new study has found.
sentences.chinese: 一項新的調查，每天喝土豆汁可以消化不良的症狀。

sentences.english: Gastritis may cause symptoms resembling those of peptic ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 胃炎可引起類似消化性潰瘍的症狀。

sentences.english: You may have heard that some foods, because they are difficult to digest, will make you lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 你一定聽說過那些難消化所以會使你體重減輕的食品。

sentences.english: Reports of variation in the stool pattern with certain elements of the diet suggest dietary intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 大便形態各異伴未消化食物提示爲飲食不耐受。

sentences.english: Any other text should be short and easy to digest.
sentences.chinese: 任何文字都應該簡短並容易消化。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 33 cases of MPCDT were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析33例消化道多原發癌的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: A procedure was carried out for digesting viscera sample with a high pressuredigester.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹高壓消解器消化臟器檢材的方法。

sentences.english: Distribution and ratio of enterococcus species among different animals were different.
sentences.chinese: 不同動物消化道腸球菌種的分佈不同，比例各異。

sentences.english: The black tea tastes strong and promotes digestion.
sentences.chinese: 紅茶茶味濃郁，有助消化。

sentences.english: Gord . Heartburn is a form of indigestion.
sentences.chinese: 心是一種形式的消化不良。

definition: to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
